title: S1 Ep85: The Psychology of the Paranormal w/ Adam Blai - Hr.1
itunes:title: The Psychology of the Paranormal w/ Adam Blai - Hr.1
description: Psychologist/Exorcist Adam Blai joins Darkness Radio to explain some of the easier explanations for why people think they are seeing what they think is the paranormal, and then warn people against the dangers of dabbling in the paranormal!
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
